name: tool-bar

scripts.debug: npm run clean && shx cp -r src dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env BABEL_ENV=development babel dist --out-dir dist
scripts.dev: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env BABEL_ENV=production rollup -c -w
scripts.build: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env BABEL_ENV=production rollup -c

tool-bar.description: A container for buttons at workspace edge
